data.text: @Sammlesie A lovely girl with a great personality.  How well she lives with the challenges she has to overcome is a testament to her feisty personality and your loving care.

@chip_daley She knows it too! She is very cheeky and has a larger than life personality. She also is the best dressed of the house and if we put the wrong clothes on her she makes sure to get them dirty or wet to make us change them! She is just brilliant

In Ava's case she is non speaking but communicates beautifully in many other ways and is very quick to tell us when we get it right and wrong and she is a full time wheel chair user. She is the Queen of our home and loved dearly and we wouldn't change a single thing about her ‚ù§

A brief synopsis of her syndrome is it is a partial chromosome deletion on the short p arm of chromosome 4, it affects people in many ways, including growth restrictions, epilepsy, intellectual disabilities, hearing and vision issues, heart and kidney issues and many other ways
